media.headline: Arenado's athletic stop
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arenado robs Braun with impressive stop
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado lays out to make a great stop on Ryan Braun's grounder and nabs him with a quick throw to first, ending the 1st inning

media.headline: Aguilar's RBI single
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Aguilar plates Shaw with a single to center
media.bigblurb: Jesus Aguilar clubs a line-drive single into center, driving in Travis Shaw in the bottom of the 2nd for his first RBI as a Brewer

media.headline: Arenado's RBI double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arenado rips an RBI double down the line
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado rips a ball down the line in left for a double and Charlie Blackmon comes in to score, tying the game at 1 in the 3rd

media.headline: Parra's bases-clearing double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Parra clears the bases with a double
media.bigblurb: Gerardo Parra drives a shot into the alley in right-center that brings in three to give the Rockies a 4-1 lead in the top of the 3rd

media.headline: Parra's catch on the run
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Parra runs down Arcia's deep fly ball
media.bigblurb: Orlando Arcia hits a fly ball to deep left field, but Gerardo Parra tracks it all the way and makes a nice catch on the run in the 3rd

media.headline: Braun's solo smash
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Braun launches a solo dinger to left
media.bigblurb: Ryan Braun jumps on a 2-2 pitch and launches it over the wall in left for a solo home run that cuts the Brewers' deficit to 4-2 in the 4th

media.headline: Shaw's sizzling RBI double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Shaw plates Santana with a scorching double
media.bigblurb: Travis Shaw crushes a ball into the gap in left-center and Domingo Santana comes around to score in the bottom of the 4th

media.headline: Reynolds' RBI double
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Reynolds pulls an RBI double to left
media.bigblurb: Mark Reynolds pulls a hard ground ball down the line into left field to plate Trevor Story and give the Rockies a 5-3 lead in the 5th

media.headline: Blackmon plates Parra
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Blackmon pads the lead with an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Charlie Blackmon sends a single into left field and Gerardo Parra crosses the plate to extend the Rockies' lead to 6-3 in the 5th

media.headline: Arcia's impressive snare
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Arcia leaps to take a hit from LeMahieu
media.bigblurb: DJ LeMahieu sends a line drive to short, but Orlando Arcia springs up to make a great catch and take a hit away in the top of the 6th

media.headline: Pina's RBI single
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Pina knocks in Santana with a sharp single
media.bigblurb: Manny Pina pulls the Brewers to within one as he hits a sharp line drive into left field to bring home Domingo Santana in the 6th

media.headline: Holland shuts the door
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Holland fans Perez to seal the win
media.bigblurb: Greg Holland finishes off a 1-2-3 9th inning by striking out Hernan Perez to pick up the save and seal a 6-5 win for the Rockies

media.headline: Davies dodges the threat
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Davies gets out of a bases-loaded jam
media.bigblurb: Zach Davies dodges the threat and gets Gerardo Parra to ground out to get out of a bases-loaded jam in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Rockies coach warms up Ottavino
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Rockies' bench coach warms up Ottavino
media.bigblurb: With no catcher ready, Rockies bench coach Mike Redmond goes out to warm up Adam Ottavino before play picks up in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Story cuts down Shaw
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Story throws out Shaw at the plate
media.bigblurb: Jett Bandy hits a broken-bat single into shallow left and Trevor Story tosses a great throw to the plate in time to cut down Travis Shaw

media.headline: Suter starts 1-6-3 double play
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Suter reacts quickly, induces nifty DP
media.bigblurb: Brent Suter quickly stops a comebacker off the bat of Tony Wolters and throws over to second to start a 1-6-3 double play in the 7th

media.headline: Shaw's RBI groundout
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Braun scores on Shaw's RBI groundout
media.bigblurb: Travis Shaw grounds out to first base and Ryan Braun trots home to score, cutting the Rockies' lead to 6-4 in the bottom of the 6th

media.headline: Anderson fans three in the 5th
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Anderson strikes out the side in the 5th
media.bigblurb: Tyler Anderson gets Orlando Arcia, Hernan Perez and Jonathan Villar to go down swinging to strike out the side in the 5th

media.headline: Braun nabs Reynolds
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Braun cuts down Reynolds at the plate
media.bigblurb: Ryan Braun picks up Charlie Blackmon's single and sends a perfect throw to the plate in time to cut down Mark Reynolds in the 5th

media.headline: Davies fans Blackmon
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Davies sits Blackmon for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Zach Davies picks up his first strikeout of the 2017 season as he gets Charlie Blackmon to go down swinging in the top of the 1st

media.headline: LeMahieu's grandmother shows up
media.blurb: COL@MIL: LeMahieu's grandmother takes in a game
media.bigblurb: DJ LeMahieu's 98-year-old grandmother makes an appearance at Miller Park to watch him play against the Brewers

media.headline: Dunn strikes out the side
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Dunn fans three straight looking in the 8th
media.bigblurb: Mike Dunn makes a relief appearance and strikes out all three batters he faces looking in the bottom of the 8th

media.headline: Counsell on 6-5 loss to Rockies
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Counsell on the defensive struggles in loss
media.bigblurb: Brewers manager Craig Counsell talks about his team giving the Rockies extra outs in a 6-5 loss to the Rockies

media.headline: Black on 6-5 win over Brewers
media.blurb: COL@MIL: Black pleased with bottom of order in win
media.bigblurb: Rockies manager Bud Black praises the production from the bottom of the order in the team's 6-5 win over the Brewers

media.headline: Recap: COL 6, MIL 5
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Parra, bullpen lead Rockies to 6-5 victory
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Gerardo Parra drove in three runs and finished with three hits as the Rockies bullpen took care of the rest in a 6-5 win

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: COL@MIL
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: COL@MIL
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: COL@MIL
